readability_reflection: string interpolation, but it is just a preference thing.

preference_rationale: I think I prefer interpolation - just as it seems neater.

suggestions_improvement: I am not too deep into the entire stack, so I am sure ultra deep hardcore techies are horrified of that, but for my purposes (data science related stuff), the f-string option in Python is really neat. Whether this is generally a good suggestion / recommendation, I refrain from saying.
